name: Cards Against Dungeons
description:
VERSION: 1.01 - read the devlog for details on the changes.

Game created in 5 days during the GameDevNetwork: Cherry Jam.

Most of the art was create by myself, but some of it was created by the itch.io community. Special thanks to them:

Kacper Woźniak

Surt R.

Warren Clark

and some free art from opengameart.org

Team size: 1 ( Factioner#2312 )
